data.title: Data Scientist
data.description:
High familiarity with data platforms and applications such as Databricks- Solid foundation in machine learning, applied stats, and/or experimentation- Experience with statistical and data programming languages, including Pyspark / Spark / Python- Experience with medium-to-large data sets (>1 M rows)- ML Experience (Nice to Have): - Applied experience of frameworks like PyTorch, Keras, Tensorflow, etc - Comfortable operating in an SDLC environment and deploying production engineering models and code

Globant is an EOE M/F/D/V. For many positions, relocation is available if needed. Globant does not accept unsolicited third party resume

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com

Follow us:
http://www.twitter.com/globant
http://www.youtube.com/Globant
http://www.facebook.com/Globant
https://instagram.com/Globant
https://www.tiktok.com/@globant

data.title: Data Scientist
data.description:
DATA SCIENTISTConcurrent Technologies CorporationNorthern Virginia
Minimum Clearance Required: TS/SCI with PolygraphClearance Level Must Be Able to Obtain: TS/SCI with Polygraph
Concurrent Technologies Corporation (CTC) is seeking highly talented and driven Data Scientists with exceptional Python programming skills. This position offers a unique opportunity to work on exciting and impactful projects that address critical challenges within the Intelligence Community (IC). You will play a crucial role in transforming vast amounts of structured and unstructured data into actionable insights through advanced data manipulation, machine learning, and innovative analytical techniques.Key Responsibilities:Data Integration and Analysis:Write sophisticated scripts to integrate diverse datasets.Conduct exploratory data analysis to uncover hidden patterns and relationships.Machine Learning and Predictive Modeling:Develop and deploy machine learning models to train predictive analytics.Apply the right combination of tools and techniques to transform disparate data points into meaningful insights.Data Enrichment and Prioritization:Enrich and prioritize data to discover relationships and correlations.Enable the identification of structures, roles, and key relationships related to actors, devices, or facilities.Situational Awareness and Data Unification:Provide situational awareness by unifying data into a coherent and accurate context.Create comprehensive visualizations that present data insights clearly and concisely.Systems Modeling and Business Analytics:Perform systems modeling to create computational analogs of real-world systems.Generate business analytics to support data-driven decision-making and enhance intelligence operations.Basic Qualifications:Educational Background:Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics, Physical Science, Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field with 4-6 years of relevant experience, Master’s degree with 2-4 years of experience, or PhD with 0-2 years of experience.Technical Expertise:Demonstrated knowledge in two or more of the following areas:Applied Mathematics (e.g., probability and statistics, multivariable calculus, linear algebra, differential equations, stochastic processes, graph theory).Computer Programming (e.g., scripting, data parsing/ETL, artificial intelligence, machine learning, natural language processing, software versioning, distributed computing).Data Visualization (e.g., dashboard creation, network analysis, GIS/geospatial analysis, telemetry analysis).Preferred Qualifications:Innovation and Problem-Solving:Demonstrated creativity and innovation in solving complex problems.Ability to organize and manage relevant information using advanced data management tools.Hypothesis Testing and Application Development:Develop hypotheses about data and create software applications to test them.Skilled in data storytelling through graphical, verbal, or written narratives.Team Collaboration:Motivated to work collaboratively and effectively within a dynamic team environment.Why CTC?Our teams at CTC are passionate and thrive on collaboration in a team environmentWhen we encounter a difficult problem, we have a variety of talented and diverse employees that work together to solve the toughest challengesCompetitive salary and benefits packageAlthough our work at CTC is extremely important, we also recognize the need for our employees to maintain a proper mix of work and personal lifeVisit www.ctc.com to learn more
Join us! CTC offers exceptional career growth, cutting edge technology, educational opportunities, and recognition for quality work.
https://concurrent-technologies-corporation.breezy.hr/Staffing Requisition: SR# 2024-0082
“We are an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.”

company.name: Concurrent Technologies Corporation
company.description: Concurrent Technologies Corporation (CTC) is an independent, nonprofit, applied scientific research and development professional services organization. CTC collaborates with its technology transition affiliate, Enterprise Ventures Corporation, to provide transformative, full lifecycle solutions through research, development, test, and evaluation work. To best serve our clients’ needs, we offer the complete ability to fully design, develop, test, prototype, and build. We deliver robust, technical, and innovative solutions that safeguard our national security, retain U.S. technological advantage, and ensure the primacy of American manufacturing.
